experience.title: Business Owner
experience.description: I was involved in managing a B2B Textiles & Readymade Garment Wholesale Trading Company, which also engages in minor manufacturing activities. Located at Cityland Trading Hub, Amravati, the business specializes in menswear, hosiery products, school uniforms, ethnic wear, and trousers. This family business is operated by me and my father.I spearheaded the launch of our e-commerce vertical to enhance B2B sales through digital channels. This involved creating a comprehensive digital catalog of our products, establishing seller accounts on various B2B marketplaces, and implementing WhatsApp marketing strategies. As a result of these efforts, our e-commerce vertical achieved annual sales exceeding 30 lakhs.I introduced an inventory management software and barcode system within the organization to streamline product data tracking and simplify billing processes. Additionally, I implemented a CRM software for effective customer management.
